TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AnonymousPipeServerStream extends System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream
Public NotInheritable Class AnonymousPipeServerStream Inherits PipeStream
public ref class AnonymousPipeServerStream sealed : System::IO::Pipes::PipeStream

summary.span: Exposes a stream around an anonymous pipe, which supports both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.

span.span: Exposes a stream around an anonymous pipe, which supports both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 匿名管道有助於提供安全子項與父代之間的處理序間通訊的處理程序。Anonymous pipes help provide safe and secure interprocess communication between child and parent processes. 類別可讓您傳送或接收資訊的子處理序從父處理序。The class enables a parent process to send or receive information from a child process. 匿名管道是未命名，但單向通常父和子處理序之間傳輸資料的管道。Anonymous pipes are unnamed, one-way pipes that typically transfer data between parent and child processes. 匿名管道永遠是本機。無法用在網路上。Anonymous pipes are always local; they cannot be used over a network. A值匿名管道定義為單向，所以不支援。A value of is not supported because anonymous pipes are defined to be one-way. 不支援匿名管道讀取模式。Anonymous pipes do not support read modes. 匿名管道的用戶端必須從所呼叫的伺服器端提供的管道控制代碼建立方法。The client side of an anonymous pipe must be created from a pipe handle provided by the server side by calling the method. 然後，做為參數來傳遞的字串，建立用戶端處理序時。The string is then passed as a parameter when creating the client process. 從用戶端處理序，它會傳遞至建構函式做為`pipeHandleAsString`參數。From the client process, it is then passed to the constructor as the `pipeHandleAsString` parameter. 物件必須用戶端控制代碼使用處置方法，以便在用戶端結束時收到通知。The object must dispose the client handle using the method in order to be notified when the client exits. > [!NOTE] > 如[!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/includes/winxppro-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/includes/win2kserver-md.md)]，最多 10 個管道同時可以透過網路連線。For [!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/includes/winxppro-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/includes/win2kserver-md.md)], a maximum of 10 pipes can simultaneously connect over the network. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用匿名管道，將字串從父處理序傳送至子處理序。The following example demonstrates a way to send a string from a parent process to a child process using anonymous pipes. 此範例會在父處理序中，使用 的 值建立 物件。This example creates an object in a parent process with a value of . 它也會建立子處理序中的物件值。It also creates an object in a child process with a value of . 接著，父處理序會將使用者提供的字串傳送給子處理序。The parent process then sends a user-supplied string to the child process. 字串會顯示到主控台。The string is displayed to the console. 這個範例適用於伺服器處理序，會使用類別。This example is for the server process, which uses the class. 整個程式碼範例中，將程式碼管道用戶端和伺服器，請參閱[How to： 使用匿名管道進行本機處理序間通訊](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-anonymous-pipes-for-local-interprocess-communication.md)。For the entire code example, including the code for both the pipe client and server, see [How to: Use Anonymous Pipes for Local Interprocess Communication](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-anonymous-pipes-for-local-interprocess-communication.md). [!code-cpp[System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream_Sample#01](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream_Sample/cpp/program.cpp#01)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream_Sample#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream_Sample/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream_Sample#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream_Sample/vb/program.vb#01)]

A值匿名管道定義為單向，所以不支援。A value of is not supported because anonymous pipes are defined to be one-way. 這個建構函式會建立具有預設緩衝區大小，而沒有管道安全性、 物件和值。This constructor creates an object that has the default buffer size, no pipe security, and a value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 後的用戶端控制代碼已傳遞至用戶端處理序，應該呼叫方法。The method should be called after a client handle has been passed to a client process. 如果未呼叫此方法，物件不會收到通知，當用戶端會處置它物件。If this method is not called, the object will not receive notice when the client disposes of its object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 後的用戶端控制代碼已傳遞至用戶端，應該呼叫方法。The method should be called after the client handle has been passed to the client. 如果未呼叫此方法，物件不會收到通知，當用戶端會處置它物件。If this method is not called, the object will not receive notice when the client disposes of its object. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用匿名管道從父處理序傳送字串至子處理序。The following example demonstrates a way to send a string from a parent process to a child process by using anonymous pipes. 在此範例中，的父處理序中建立物件值。In this example, an object is created in a parent process with a value of .
